question: India's first national social security platform is proposed to be developed by the:
option1: Department of Food and Public Distribution
option2: Department of Electronics and Information Technology (DeitY)
option4: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
answer: Department of Electronics and Information Technology (DeitY)
explanation: India's first national social security platform will be developed by the Department of Electronics and Information Technology (DeitY). It will be seeded with Aadhaar and Jan Dhan accounts of all the beneficiaries for direct transfer of benefits. DeitY will develop the platform while the other ministries will use this platform to authenticate their beneficiaries.
